elements.text:
You have to give a presentation in a meeting today. When you stand up in front of the group, you feel your cheeks get hot and your hands start to tremble.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I ask my boss if I can present another day.
I consider pretending that I'm sick so I don't have to present, but challenge myself to give the presentation anyway.
I smile and start my presentation.
I want to go to the bathroom and splash my face with water, but decide to refocus on my surroundings to relax and power through.
I speak with a strong voice.
